TextView.android:text: Covid-19 - Discussion & Review for all concern related to daily challenges
DWM and Gemba Round(Abnormality finding and suggestions)

5 Board Review, 6 Production Rules (ANDON, PCB, QCB, Standard Work, KANBAN, Min-Max) Inventory, 4M Control, P-Chart, Scribble Board, FIFO, One Piece Flow, Scrap Yard, Poka-Yoke Verification, 5S (Boards, Corners, Almirah, Unidentified Material etc), Night Shift Review, Daily Shortage Review, Over Time Review etc.
LPA at CTQ (Station / Line) as per SOP-0803
Covid-19- LPA & HR Activity Review (As Covid-19 LPA & HR DWM)
BEST Review (Review of Improvement Projects / CFT's/Convention/Safety etc)
Corp/CMD/ CEOs reviews- Gemba and Mfg /Quality/ Safety/ Manpower etc.
Protivity audits/Corp assessments/ statutory auditors/ Govt deptt visits and PR
Unit QCD review against Budget/MIS/SQPCDM targets
Meeting as per Interunit / Group Calendar(Group Functional Meeting/Committee meeting)
BEST Review (Review of Improvement Projects / CFT's/Convention/Safety etc)
Manufacturing Road Map (Focus on Mfg. cost optimisation)- Productivity/QPH, Energy Cost & Other Variable Cost
MIS & MPCP Review for all deptt.
Check on check for critical Process
1) Others activities to be done as per A-GAC E.g. MRBP, Budget, Detail Review, OS Meet, Open House, Appraisals, Supplier Meet, A+ Get Together, I-Meet, Strategic Meet, CIJ, PMS etc
2) Daily Activity Consider 20 days only due to rest days occupied for OD's e.g. Visit at Customer, Supplier, Management Review, Group meeting etc.
3) In case of development, Review will be separate
